message.raw:
Initial support assertions: GZB_ASSERT

 - GZB_ASSERT is basically a BOOST_ASSERT_MSG

 - Define exceptions to handle internal errors:
    InteralError >> AssertionInternalError

 - Asserts can throw: nothing at all, raw asserts or
   AssertionInternalError exceptions.

 - Include testing for all these components

  • Include testing for all these components
